# avn-data-grid-cell



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Represents a single cell in an AvnDataGrid.

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                            | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `line`     | `line`     | Indicates whether the cell should display a horizontal line separator. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `sortable` | `sortable` | Indicates whether the column is sortable.                              | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                  | Description                  |
| --------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `--cell-alignment`    | Alignment for the cell       |
| `--cell-border-color` | Colour to use for the border |
| `--cell-padding`      | Padding to apply to the cell |
